_sText: csde_contamination Test release, beta 1 - 10/30/07 Scenario A local terrorist group has just recently taken siege to a remote water treatment facility. They have 4 late night workers hostage, and plan to destroy key facility assets in order to contaminate the local water with what seems to be a new string of Small-Pox. Objectives .CT Prevent the terrorists from causing destruction to the facility's filtration system and the reservoir. Try to save the hosties if at all possible as well, good luck. .T Protect the hostages from CT rescue, and destroy the filtration system and reservoir. PLEASE GIVE CC SO I CAN EVEN BETTER THE FINAL VERSION. THANK YOU. --- Questions? Comments? Problems? AIM/YIM/XFIRE/STEAM : Sebhael Email - SebhaelATtimelessagonyDOTnet
